lead_paragraph: SARNA--Richard J.,D.D.S., died peacefully at home on July 22 from complications of ALS. Beloved husband of Ellen, loving father of Jeremy and caring brother of John. Service will be held Sunday, July 24th, at 11:30am, at Congregation Kol Ami, 252 Soundview Ave., White Plains, NY. Interment to follow at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, NY. Donations may be made to Clearwater, 724 Wolcott Ave., Beacon, NY 12508, www.clearwater.org or Congregation Kol Ami. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SARNA, RICHARD J.
